channel.title: wave on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in wave on Rusland 1

item.title: дурной вкус (durnoy vkus) 3x
item.description: думаешь ты (Do You Think, 2020) Video by Alberto Mendez, who added tourist film footage to the music. From светомузыка (2020); also check the title track by Mendez. Explicit lyrics, simple chords. звук и темнота (Sound and Darkness, 2019) Also on #Winter Holidays.

item.title: горемыка – Scary sounds in Russian
item.description: Debut single (2020) and title track from an EP with four songs. Video on YouTube (featuring scenes from the film Лунная радуга, 1983), lyrics here and below. Если кто и прав Я его накажу. Солнце не взойдет Если не танцевать.

item.title: Окружающий Мир – Dance with Me (Танцуй Со Мной)
item.description: Lyrics available on Lyricstranslate and in the second video below. Minor corrections have been made in the lyrics at the bottom. Танцуй со мной (Dance with Me) Slow cigarette smoke Spreads everywhere And I’m walking my girlfriend home We drank all night Danced all evening We just wanted To feel lighter together.

item.title: Molchat Doma (Молчат Дома)
item.description: Molchat Doma x Ploho The link with Ploho is often made. Both bands maintain friendly relations and, in 2019, recorded По краю острова together ( lyrics, lyrics with translation). See also An Introduction to Russian Post-Punk with Ploho and Molchat Doma (Post-punk.

item.title: Ploho 3x
item.description: Here are (in terms of clips) two recent ones and a classic. An article on Regenmag (EN) about an upcoming album, with more links to Ploho’s channels. Молодость (Youth, 2018) With sun and sea, plus the convenience of English subtitles.

item.title: Kapitan Nenavidit More 3x
item.description: Черная лента (with Crosswise, 2017) Давай никогда больше не улыбаться: let’s never smile again. Lyrics Alternative version: fan-made video Траур (2015) Речей течение тел влечение – бравур Здесь каждый заслужил по праву Траур. Lyrics
